[shortdesc]

Scotch Thermal Laminating Pouches, TP5851-20-C, 6 cm x 9.5 cm (2.36 in x 3.74 in), 20 pouches per pack

  • Scotch® Thermal Laminating Pouches help protect documents from damage with a clear, professional finish
  • Handle your documents without damaging them or create clean clean, crisp and rewritable surfaces for your classroom and home
  • Ideally suited for use with Scotch® Thermal Laminator or any standard thermal pouch laminator.

Scotch Laminating System, LS950
